title: Smart data models - Building Operation schema
description: Information on a given Building Operation

type.description: Property. It has to be BuildingOperation

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refBuilding.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Building reference where the operation is performed.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refOperator.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Reference to the Operator doing the operation on the building.

operationType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Type of the operation on the building

result.description: Property. Result of the building operation. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Enum:'ok, aborted'

startDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The planned start date for the operation.

endDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The planned end date for the operation.

dateStarted.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The actual start date for the operation.

dateFinished.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. The actual end date for the operation.

status.description: Property. Status of the operation. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Enum:'cancelled, finished, ongoing, planned, scheduled'

operationSequence.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Id of the sequence of the operation when available

refRelatedBuildingOperation.description: Relationship. Reference to other building operations when in sequence

refRelatedDeviceOperation.description: Relationship. Devices related to the current operation. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. A list of references to an entity of type Device.
